TopicTitle: Star Wars vs Star Trek: The Carbonite Maneuver!

Articles.Content:
Just ran across this clip from while surfing the Space.com website. Perfectly done 80's-style sci-fi

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IuYhjAXIAro?start=71&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Blasphemy!

But seriously, I like both Star Wars and Star Trek in their own ways.

That was a cool clip and made me smile!
Even as a clear Star Trek Fan and Star Wars enemy this made me laugh, really nice work
That was awesome in every way!
